data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Nzérékoré.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nzérékoré, Guinea
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Nzérékoré, Guinea to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 11,187 believers in Nzérékoré that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Nzérékoré.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Maan people. 0.9% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Nzérékoré, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Nzérékoré, Guinea so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nzérékoré, Guinea has a population of 1,578,000.

We estimate Nzérékoré has 11,187 people who might know Jesus, 54,921 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,511,891 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 141 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Nzérékoré, Guinea to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

location.name: Nzérékoré
location.people_groups_list: Toma, Kpelle, Manya, Mandingo, Kla-Dan, Kono
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Toma (245,000), Kpelle (575,000), Manya, Mandingo (83,000), Kla-Dan (1,200), Kono (169,000)
